attributes.action:
FEED THE CHILDREN
give free school meals to children in need in and out of term
attributes.additional_details:
Give free school meals in and outside of term for those children in need.

The government MUST reverse the decision. It should not be left to independent organisations and the kindness and good will of individuals.  Yes they can mop up but the driving force should come from Government.  Children are suffering.  For everything else they may have to endure, do not let hunger be one of them.  Imagine your child.

DO NOT JUDGE ALL PARENTS ALIKE

SOME ARE GOOD PEOPLE GOING THROUGH TOUGH TIMES
attributes.background:
Children in deprived areas have a very real potential to go hungry this half term because the government reversed the decision to allow free school meals for those in need,  

Please reverse this immediately

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Fund free school meals over school holidays until April 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555727

Provide the free school meal entitlement throughout the year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555723

End child food poverty – no child should be going hungry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554276
